summary: This document outlines the bylaws of Mort, Inc., detailing the structure and governance of the corporation, including the roles and responsibilities of shareholders and directors, meeting protocols, and procedures for voting and indemnification. It was adopted by the shareholders, including Jeffrey Epstein, indicating his involvement in the corporation's governance.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned as a shareholder who adopted the bylaws of Mort, Inc. on April 12, 2011.

keyFacts: The bylaws detail the governance structure of Mort, Inc., including the roles of shareholders and directors.
Meetings of shareholders are to be held annually on the second Tuesday in June.
The document specifies procedures for voting, including proxy voting and quorum requirements.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as a shareholder who adopted these bylaws.
The bylaws include provisions for the indemnification of directors and officers.
